entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Courtenay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:47 p.m. PDT Thursday 6 April 2023

Observed at: Comox Airport 8:00 PM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023
Condition: Rain and Fog

Visibility: 4 km
Humidity: 92 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind southeast 40 km/h except 60 over exposed coastal sections this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming south 20 after midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023
